name: Flexpay Solutions
slogan: Cofounder & CPO for a secure and automated digital overdraft alternative
description: General interest rates of 35-40% for all overdraft users have/will become reality until the 6th April 2020, with increasing cost for previously arranged overdraft users with reliable credit histories. FlexPay Solutions offers a secure and automated digital alternative avoiding bureaucratic credit applications with expensive and longer-lasting credit alternatives (e.g. payday).

jobs.title: Co-Founder / CPO
jobs.description:
If you’re interested in changing the cost structure and business model dictated by banks, FlexPay Solutions offers a chance to become an integral stakeholder in a rapidly expanding sector. We are seeking a hands-on Co-Founder & CPO (Chief Product Officer) to join me and the CTO to structure and execute the on-going technology build. We offer a fair share of equity as you’ll optimally lead the product development, marketing strategy & operations workstreams in a team of 3 founders.

Optimally, you will bring the following experiences:

* Proven track record in defining credit products
* Experience in bringing a credit product to market
* Knowledge of legal requirements to launch a debt product
* Strategy experience in FinTech solutions and customer acquisition
* Lending or risk management experience
* Previous ownership of different workstreams & teams
* Creation of marketing roadmaps and growth models

Eventually:

* Operations and team-building experiences
* Well connected to the FinTech world and previous funding experience

If you consider yourself a good fit for identifying technological opportunities around Open Banking and future business models in the short-term lending market coupled with business and commercial operations and would like to grow a business and share an outlook to making a material impact in the Financial Services sector, please express your interest and we will respond to every suitable applicant.
